website_summaries.verdict: The Oculus Go is an affordable, comfortable standalone virtual reality headset that lets you try out VR without making a big investment in hardware.
pros: No phone, PC, or game system required
cons: Underpowered compared with tethered and flagship smartphone-powered headsets

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay, resolution is still nothing special and the range of games is quite limited. Admittedly there are a high number of titles but the lack of variation is the issue. For the price it is a good introduction to VR and I like being cable free, but it's still not the hardware that pushes the barriers enough for me
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: an amazing piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: this accessible introduction to VR is amazing. the VR world takes a bit of getting used to but for a non-gamer like myself its a huge wow. Sure some development is needed to improve picture quality and function in some apps , but the creative skill and imagination of the VR artists already producing work out there is mindblowing and you can experience it all from your own sofa. A great way to relax and disengage the mind. I say lets welcome this addition to the VR world, support and encourage its development .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST, AND MOST POWERFUL, VR HEADSET
customer_reviews.text: Arrived beautifully packed on the delivery date. Professional service. This is, by far, THE BEST AND MOST POWERFUL VR HEADSET, worth every penny. I'm so glad I did my research and discovered it. I'm extremely happy with it. So simple, easy and fun, to set-up, following the on-line instructions. I've already been on a cave journey featured on the National Geographic Channel and a roller coaster ride in cartoon land and in Italy! Best of all, it's light and comfortable to wear and wireless, enabling you to move around anywhere. I highly recommend this product. It will keep me occupied all the time. 😀 Thank you very much indeed, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Fun and educational
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Educational and great fun. Even when you are watching other people it is hilarious. I have used it in school for the kids to research the solar system, to move around Anne Frank's hiding place and to travel to places of historic interest. My mother-in-law is too frail to return to her "home" in NI, but she can go there with the Oculus and the wander app. She spent a nostalgic 90 minutes walking around her home village. I use it to watch Netflix and there are rollercoasters galore. It lasts a good 2 hours on each charge. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Sloan

customer_reviews.title: V.R for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the oculus go for around 4 months now. Pros - some games great fun, some of the horror games actually give you a scare ( which is a good thing), really easy to use and set up, glasses adapter is a good thing. Cons - it’s not something that I use everyday.. I actually prefer others to use it so they can experience it so only comes out once or twice a week. The price of some of the games is far too high. Once you’ve played a game you don’t tend to go back and play it again. Don’t use it as much as I thought I would, but I’m still glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie

customer_reviews.title: Oculus Go Standalone Virtual Reality Headset - 64GB
customer_reviews.text: . Excellent device for the money gives a pseudo VR experience. Pros:- Truly portable, use it anywhere, even outside, sometimes even without WiFi. Can watch 2D, 3D, 180, 360 and VR movies as if you are in an IMAX cinema. Comfortable, no trailing umbilical cables. Lots of material available Cons:- Not truly VR - there are no external sensors so cannot detect walkabout movement. Simple control device, can limit scope of games etc. .
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Oculus go.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 star but the unit arrived with only a power cable for the computer, despite the website indicating a wall plug power line. It takes hours and hours (around 4 hrs) to charge which is a bummer when you need the Oculus go during presentations. After some correspondence Oculus stated this wall plug power cable was only for USA supplied items. SO why include it and misleading buyers ? You have been warned. The VR is great - just get the recharging time sorted and supply the walled charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: John Mcevoy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing technology
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Fits comfortably on my head and I wear glasses. Very easy to set up with app. Very intuitive. Wish all devices were so easy to set up. Technology is brilliant. However I had severe nausea heachache and dizziness which lasted for about 4hrs after using the device. Sadly I don't think VR is for me.
customer_reviews.author: Matrix TTD

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for my Grandson so this is his review. He loves the headset but found the fitting on the face was uncomfortably. This was resolved by the purchase of a different fitting which has improved things greatly. To play most games he needs an x box controller which he is now saving pocket money and doing jobs to earn enough to purchase. He has found the resolution generally good and has enjoyed watching films, you tube and engaging with friends during the Coronavirus lockdown in the uk. It has been a great purchase in these difficult times and only missing the 5 star due to the fitting. Although my grandson is a tough reviewer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Your own personal huge cinema screen
customer_reviews.text: It's a pity that oculus have stopped making this. It's really very good value for a completely wireless headset which allows you to effectively watch a movie on the equivalent of a huge cinema screen. I'm unlikely to ever play a game and will only use it for video. It's also a bit much to wear for long periods so I don't think I'd watch two movies back to back with it. I was surprised though how much I liked it. I bought it on a whim and was pleasantly surprised at how good the effect is.
customer_reviews.author: Spamvindaloo

customer_reviews.title: No multiplayer/friends without Facebook
customer_reviews.text: The device is amazing, immersive and offers 3D movie viewing for a really good price. Battery life is about 2 - 2.5 hours but takes 3 hours to charge. For single user it’s truly a great bit of kit and I would give it 5 stars However... excited to join up with friends in a virtual world only to find out you have to sign in with Facebook to add friends. Nowhere on the packaging does it say this is obligatory, rather a Oculus account is needed I’m not going to sign up to Facebook to have my private data harvested. So no multiplayer options.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M

customer_reviews.title: Condensation on screen
customer_reviews.text: The only problem i have found with this item is that it fogs up very easily, i am not sure whether this is the case for all vr headsets but what i do know is that with this one i often find my sf either breathing normally and having to wipe the display every five minutes or so, or breath downwards so that the display doesnt fogs which makes it quite uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I have Oculus Rift too
customer_reviews.text: ..and I was unsure to buy this one. After over a month, I use the Go more than the Rift. Why? Because it's easier to use, you just pick it and wear, start a game or movie and enjoy. With the Rift the graphic is of couse better, but turn on PC, set the cables, start the Oculus app, start the game... I'm not saying this is better, it's just different, I'm happy to have them both.
customer_reviews.author: nnsense

customer_reviews.title: Oculus Go Standalone Virtual Reality Headset - 64GB
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a massive CON by Oculus and Amazon as just as i have bought this item in the past couple of days and this was sold legitimately on Amazon that Oculus are pulling the plug on the Oculus Go and withdrawing all support from it so no updates no support but still selling very expensive VR devices that literally are now NOT FIT FOR PURPOSE.....Shame on you Amazon (Who will probarbly pull my Review) for allowing Oculus to rip us off.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but battery life is an issue
customer_reviews.text: The VR experience is pretty good BUT battery life is a real deal breaker. Playing anything 3D intensive really kills the charge and makes it very hard to recommend. A lot of the software is rather poor and it is obvious that it is a basically a mobile phone doing all the processing work. Pay a bit more and go the Quest. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery capacity and long charging times let this down
customer_reviews.text: I have given the oculus go 4/5 stars because of the 2hr battery usage and waiting hours until its fully charged. Apart from that it's a great headset and has better screen than my galaxy s6 with gear vr. I sent mine back because of the battery usage. The controller is only 3 degrees of freedom but a more powerful version is coming out next year with 6dof.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Still Good for 2020
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is excellent for the price and the controller is very responsive. The headset is much more comfortable than oyhers I've tried, although it does leave two prominent lines under my eyes where there is a line in the foam. The short battery life is annoying, as I feel like I'm constantly running out of juice every time I use it. I originally wanted the Quest but it's been out of stock for a while and I wanted a VR headset to use during lockdown. I would advise getting the Quest instead of you are able to and especially if you want to play proper games
customer_reviews.author: M. Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, get Quest instead, trust me
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it. Get Quest instead. I had it, sent it back and now got Quest 128mb mega cool. That’s it. If you finding this review helpful, please click helpful button below. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MegaSeb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for VR newbies and great price
customer_reviews.text: First venture into VR and I'm not disappointed... This is amazing. Considering it's stand alone it's really good, and there are loads of apps. I'm using reviews from others to find ones, as there are absolutely loads. The YouTube VR is amazing, walking with elephants is incredible. I love how comfortable it is! The only real downside (which is to be expected and is understandable) is the battery life, but you get a good two hours and it only takes 2-3 to charge. Overall I'd 100% recommend, and I'd go for the 64GB so you can store more apps!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, I would start with a mix of some free apps and some purchased ones.
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about buying this but I needn't have worried. It is a good quality product and comes with everything you need. It was very easy to set up using a downloadable app on your mobile. Very easy to become familiar with all aspects of Headset. It really is great fun to use and it it is fabulous being untethered. I would recommend the higher memory option as you can never have enough memory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but expensive for what it does
customer_reviews.text: The headset does give an imersive experience but there are some negatives. The battery life is around 2 hours but this does not affect your viewing as the headset is not comfortable, the padding is not good enough and hurts your nose. The controller is rubbish and nt very responsive, when scrolling through menus it is hit and miss. The choice of free stuff could be better and the pay for stuff is not brilliant. If you have the slightest hint of motion sickness give it a miss or buy a very large bucket!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't clean the lenses!
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed with the quality of the lenses. I've tried with and without my classes on and just can't get a good image, there seems to be some marks or smudging on the lenses that are either on the inside or can't be removed using the supplied cleaning cloth, it's just like looking through dirty glasses but other than this annoying issue the content available from National Geographic is nothing short of stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good VR set with some issues
customer_reviews.text: The performance and quality es great, however, from the side does not adjust perfectly to my face, sometimes creates condensation on the lens borrowing the lenses, this is just with my breathing. It takes time to download videos to play or reproduce 360 videos (I do have 200 MB fibre). WIth 64gb can be a bit short if you like to storage many games and videos, does not have to upgrade external memory, waiting to test quest.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Educational and brilliant fun
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought it mainly for educational purposes. Little boy and I love going into space, or flying over The Yosemite’s, gallery’s and national geographic
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Nicola M. Nicolle

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money & family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, as do the rest of the family & friends we have shared it with! The fact that it is stand alone makes it so convenient. Great variety of games, experiences & many other interesting VR adventures, many of them free, available from Oculus. Easy to download straight to the device ( no computer needed). I could wax lyrical about this forever!!
customer_reviews.author: lyn suddens

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Oculus Go. I already own a psvr but hardly use it as a) I’m not a huge gamer and b) it’s a hassle setting it up every time and being tethered by wires. With the Go, I can just slip it on and be watching a movie or experience in minutes if not seconds. There’s 100’s of games available which will keep anyone busy but if your looking for hardcore games I’d recommend a different headset for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great starter VR, reasonable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is am excellant alternative to the very expensive HTC vive. It was a Christmas present for my 11 year old son and his first experience of VR so a good starter. I love that it only needs a phone for start up and not thereafter....haven’t given in to phone yet. It can be used offline as stuff saved on it so that’s helpful for long car journeys. Setup very easy. It has been used by kids and adults for a fantastic experience! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kate1975

customer_reviews.title: Poor image
customer_reviews.text: Even with the high resolution screen it's not good enough. Like watching a 720p screen up close. Not good for movies really if you care about quality at all. Tracks head very well and no lag in movement no sickly feeling at all. just the resolution that's the problem and it's a bit slow browsing Internet too
customer_reviews.author: ofek

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable experience!
customer_reviews.text: Initially blown away as the first clip I viewed had me positioned in the cockpit of a fighter jet and experiencing a sudden surge of vertigo that quickly transformed into a feeling of exhilaration. The 360 videos are quite stunning but there needs to be a greater variety of subjects, perhaps involving wild animals like "surrounded by lions". I particularly like the meditation videos where I float above beaches and waterfalls in Asian countries which is extremely relaxing. I also enjoy watching Wales, (who else?) , playing in previous six Nations games that I have forgotten the outcome of, feeling once again the satisfaction of beating England. Just joking!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my son for his birthday the whole family love it there are so many games and watching a film you get a full cinema experience
customer_reviews.author: katie davies

customer_reviews.title: Best buy in years!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great. If you're a hardcore gamer it's probably not for you but as a good introduction to VR it's fantastic. There are some great :experiences: (some absolutely terrifying.) I love the App Tripp which changes daily and is really relaxing. Loads of educational films. Oh, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Fleety

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic technology
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for the price. Lots of free games and paid games and can connect to You Tube VR Fantastic technology Only reason I haven’t given it five stars is that after three weeks, the foam has started coming away from the headset
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gregory

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GOOD BUT WAS UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE SAMSUNG GEAR VR WHICH IS PRETTY GOOD, I BOUGHT THE OCULUS GO AS AN UPGRADE. IT HAS SLIGHTLY BETTER RESOLUTION ETC BUT THE BIG PROBLEM AND WHY I CANNOT KEEP IT IS THE LACK OF COMFORT. THE FOAM SURROUND GIVES ME SOME SORT OF ALLERGIC REACTION, IT PUSHES ON MY CHEEKS BUT WHATEVER IT IS MADE OF REALLY IRRITATED MY SKIN, THEY WERE RED AND SOAR AFTER ONLY 10 MINUTES. THE GEAR VR I HAVE HAS MUCH BETTER COMFORT. IT’S A SHAME BECAUSE ITS GOT VERY GOOD SOUND AND THE PICTURE IS A BIT CLEARER THAN THE GEAR VR.
customer_reviews.author: ian barnett

customer_reviews.title: Whatever you do DON'T buy this product! It belongs to Big Brother Facebook!
customer_reviews.text: Oculus promised you would never need a Facebook account to use this product. Now they are forcing everyone to sign up to Facebook in order to use it. I don't have a Facebook account and I don't want one so now this product is useless to me. Beware of being spied on by Facebook if you ever buy one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Van

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner for his birthday! It’s great fun fun for all the family - so much content - I specially love the Jurassic world video - the price is great - would invest in some motion controllers too 👍
customer_reviews.author: Miss B.

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it was interesting investigating apps but very slow to connect, download and respond despite having superfast broadband. Very disappointed. Might have been faulty unit so returned and had a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: MEME

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for prolonged use
customer_reviews.text: VR offers enjoyable experiences, ranging from 180 to 360 degrees. The sense of space and surrounding sound is very good. The growing number of applications and YouTube VR make standalone headsets a better choice than counterparts using phones as screens.
customer_reviews.author: dbmsdev

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant and so realistic but needs more content added without extra costs There is free content but it’s limited and when using is like the App Store where if you want content you have to pay
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective gaming visor
customer_reviews.text: Slightly fuzzy but very effective and efficient. Easy to use. Much better than expensive devices requiring fast pc access.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. S. Mudhar

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a go on a Rift, and thought I gotta have a go at this. Couldn't justify a pc upgrade, so I gave this a punt. Well impressed is all I can say! Great fun, works well, loads of free stuff, but even paid games aren't that expensive. So pleased I bought one..went for the 64GB version...worth it for the extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chris Gration

customer_reviews.title: Great product that could benefit from a longer battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, what I expected for the amount spent. Good graphics and variety. Only issue I found was with the battery lifespan, felt like i spent more time charging than using. The weight is relatively good for the amount of time used, but on extended periods would require you to support your neck to avoid strain. Otherwise very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anas Msaddi

customer_reviews.title: Overheats after just 20-30 minute of game play or VR chat.
customer_reviews.text: Edited review: Had to return this for a refund as the overheating issue was driving me insane. Now how do I get a refund for the apps I purchased? I'm sick of throwing money away with Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Explain a bit more what is wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: The strap was worn out and split and I wear glasses and it did not come with the extra part to fit on when you wear glasses .you didn't say next time put more about it what's wrong with it so when I look through it it's all blurred .so I have to buy the extra piece so time I finished I could have bought a new one
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Great!! But problems with initial set up!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a good few hours to set up. I had to delete the app, reboot the headset as the screen was stuck on updating. This was very frustrating. However I have now completed set up and all seems great. Looks like I’m gonna have a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Michelle George

customer_reviews.title: Limitations
customer_reviews.text: Battery power is poor.Recharging takes too long.Functions such ESC are difficult and 'Hit or Miss' at best.Picture quality is best in 180 degree mode.Camera following a subject moving,e.g. a person walking forward;made my stomach upset.I had to end session.Virtual Reality makes objects close,but scaled down. A smart tech novelty,that users will grow tired of in time.What will they think of next I wonder?
customer_reviews.author: merv

customer_reviews.title: Glad I brought this
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but you need to remember to change it after each use.. mine does get quite hot on the outside so it will switch off to cool . But great escape
customer_reviews.author: sharon Baynham

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bit of kit. We don't use it enough but when we do we enjoy it. A good intro to VR for my two young boys (8 and 12). It needs a "killer" app to really take it to the next level to get used every day.
customer_reviews.author: Optic

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Grate device currently cant stop useing it since got it and amazing delivery off amazon as well come on well secured in package etc, would recromend this to people that are new/considering VR for gaming or just watch VR/3D videos off youtube etc if currently dont have a computer or any other device capable in doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Welshdroo

customer_reviews.title: I am very glad that I bought one!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! Quality product and worth the money as the use value is good for me with loads a apps and experiencesand . Vr on this head set is quite mindblowing and the functionality is great downloading from there App Store.
customer_reviews.author: Steve r

customer_reviews.title: VR! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: As an educational and entertainment tool this unit is amazing. So many sights and emotions at the touch of a button. Really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: the travelling
customer_reviews.text: I love this Oculus, It would be good if they made them for young children, I know m grandson would like one very much.
customer_reviews.author: happy days

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I wish I invested in a newer model. I had a few problems to start with but all in all it's great.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experiance
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool piece of kit .... The vr experience is something everyone should try, not just the rollercoaster clips but the games and video footage is really good . You have 360° of things to look at ,having stuff going on behind you & underneath you gives it a whole different feel.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O'Kell

customer_reviews.title: expensive rubbish
customer_reviews.text: wish I had returned these as they have been sat under my sons bed since I bought them he said boring as hell
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. mac

customer_reviews.title: Price change
customer_reviews.text: Great bit of kit. I confirmed It was the one my misses wanted abd went up £50 over night :(
customer_reviews.author: lee sidney wettner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product you get so much in this headset amazing large screens and huge size viewings.I have been using ordinary headsets for few years but have never seen anything like this.Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aslam

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic piece of kit, bought for son for Xmas whilst on sale. So good.
customer_reviews.author: Zoeb

customer_reviews.title: Not for adult
customer_reviews.text: Didn't meet my expectation, games are way to short, maybe for kids below 10 is ok.
customer_reviews.author: JIMMY H.

customer_reviews.title: Where is my Refund?
customer_reviews.text: What a Load of Hassle set up Found out it was faulty I’m no computer expert so I took it to my nephews house which he’s a Computer Genius told me it’s faulty
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is 100% worth it. Never heard of the device until recently, but it’s great! Good visuals, lots of free content and hilarious to watch someone using. Really was a good decision to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty

customer_reviews.title: Nearly there but not quite
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and great games but heavy on head and warm
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: The screen quality could've been better.
customer_reviews.text: It's very good in general but I was expecting the screen to have higher quality. I can see the pixels. The software is really nice though. I'm sure a Samsung galaxy in a 15£ vr case will look better.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Constantinou

customer_reviews.title: Not what it said on the tin..
customer_reviews.text: The headset works fine, although the speakers sound a little distorted. The main problem was the charger not present and the headset really stank, like a smelly sock!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great way to access virtual reality
customer_reviews.text: Love love love, easy to use, works longer than expected off one charge, fast, great picture, comfortable to wear, I’m very pleased with This oculus
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault this system much, I think its better than the ps4 vr, No wires... Easy to use and downloading games is also easy. Only problem is casting to tv or phone isn't easy and lags or freezes but I think a update in the future will fix this. Really happy.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Bad experience all round. Sadly had to return it for a full refund all because the initial setup phone application didn't work properly!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Good times
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and portably for the reason you want it for. Thankyou to the Czech Republic and Oculus for all your hard work so that I can play hard.
customer_reviews.author: Drusus

customer_reviews.title: No cables or wires trailing
customer_reviews.text: Out of this World,Fantastic Experience ,Oculus have loads of FREE Stuff too
customer_reviews.author: Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, reliable seller
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, in the box as described. Great communication - I had a few problems setting up so messaged the seller who got back to me immediately to help me resolve my technical issues. Happy customer, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t charge, the serial number on the device was different to the box and I have a very disappointed son on his birthday! I’m fuming!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing standalone VR set
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for money Loads of Apps & Games Evolution could be: -external memory to expand storage -easier sideload (upload from computer) -having two controlers -google playstore not (yet) available
customer_reviews.author: Corentin

customer_reviews.title: Video/Image quality pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as I don’t have much space for the oculus rift but was disappointed by the video quality that it has and the very low battery life. It has amazing features for a standalone headset and it has a pretty decent amount of free apps.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice A

customer_reviews.title: my refund
customer_reviews.text: i wanted the VR headset for my son but it kept falling off his face and had to keep the resetting controller i well bye him a better one when i get the refound p geraghty
customer_reviews.author: philip geraghty

customer_reviews.title: Good product for TV shows and Movies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to watch tv shows and movies and this device is great. The clarity of the image is not the same as on TV screen but with the customization of the virtual screen, I can say that it’s worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Thebuyer

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant virtual reality all in one unit. Only downer is battery life but purchase of charger solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: supramaniac121

customer_reviews.title: VR for the masses
customer_reviews.text: All in all the Oculus Go is a very good introduction to the world of Virtual Reality, It's ease of use combined with a light headset make this an easy option as a beginners introduction to VR .....
customer_reviews.author: brendan donohue

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time used VR and its brilliant
customer_reviews.author: D.G.Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: The control
customer_reviews.text: I am pissed off as the control did not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple of months now, constantly turns off while in use
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Rider

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fun ! You have see it to believe just how good it is
customer_reviews.author: Frey Bentos

customer_reviews.title: Best experience you probably will ever feel
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing piece of equipment I can’t believe the whole world doesn’t know about this gadget amazing experiences and loads of fun
customer_reviews.author: gary turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice but battery is a concern
customer_reviews.text: I like the product , amazing VR experience. Watching Netflix or Amazon is also very nice, however batter backup is a concern . Does not last more than 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: akshay

customer_reviews.title: There is a lot of paying items
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bit of kit the real deal love it

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Impressive But not high definition Good for gaming but not watching films
customer_reviews.author: Miss Emma L Debbage

customer_reviews.text: One of the controllers stopped working for one of the headsets.

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, 15 year old hasn't complained, so can't be bad

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Battery life isn't what it is said to be. Dies too quick and runs to slow

customer_reviews.title: Go with Oculus
customer_reviews.text: I think the best way into VR. Certainly the cheapest and easiest to use.
customer_reviews.author: colin fraser

customer_reviews.title: Good, but battery life could be better
customer_reviews.text: My issue with this device is the battery life - otherwise it's excellent
customer_reviews.author: james chalmers

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work was broke from the first time u tried to plug it in I need a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Tony mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Good price bit of fun entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Fun gadget to enjoy some causal gaming and watch 360 videos
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bullen

customer_reviews.title: Best VR
customer_reviews.text: This Is amazing tech love it it’s so real it’s unbelievable a must buy if you want to experience VR
customer_reviews.author: Hugh B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Great for watching movies, great for 3D VR content, easy to use, just fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pedley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its great ...... and the next step in this VR-TEC hardware ....
customer_reviews.author: Darron

customer_reviews.title: A great leap for consumer portable VR however still much left to desire.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than other portable VR kits, however, the clarity of these consumer devices is still somewhat lacking. The battery life is also by my experience around an hour long, which is less than the average length of a movie, although even if I could watch an entire movie, I would not due to the eye strain when using the device.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Bao

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend the Oculus Go
customer_reviews.text: The graphics and sound are more than some expected but you are immersed inside another set of worlds. There are so many choices of games and virtual 360 experiences. If only the battery life was longer and there was six degrees of movement instead of three degrees of movement. I would highly recommend the Oculus Go.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonflameace

customer_reviews.title: For the money - superb!
customer_reviews.text: I had told myself that I would 'wait until someone did VR 'properly' before buying any kind of kit. I also thought, by now, Apple would of joined the party and released something that will astonish everyone (I guess they might still), but, for £200 I was tempted to buy the Oculus Go. I love it! The interface is a joy to use and the quality is pretty good (especially for what it cost). I do think that VR is still somewhat in it's 'infancy' in terms of the sharpness and clarity of the display (which is where I suspect Apple will be concentrating). Fundamentally, for £200 it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & affordable VR but poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Personal Imax style cinema, Netflix in bed, better optics than the Rift, comfortable & affordable VR. It's a great media player. Cons: Awful battery life* (not helped by its twitchy not-really-off mode), mostly GearVR type software, crappy (ie no adblock) browser, prefer the Rifts elegant controller, the thumb touchpad on this feels flaky in use. Missing but should be required: Google Earth and Youtube apps. * Seriously bad, like watch one movie and it's done bad, even less time if you're playing games, 1.5 - 2 hours (officially recommended to not use whilst charging) and charging isn't fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T Paulazzo

customer_reviews.title: Not totally impressed
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would give VR a try but not overly impressed by the visual quality. My friends daughter likes it so it does get some use. Would I buy one again probably not and I will be wary of computer magazines recommendations in the future.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t go on, can’t get it to charge. Any suggestions?? Disappointed birthday boy today :(
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. Carlone

product_meta.title: Oculus Go Standalone Virtual Reality Headset - 64GB
product_meta.description:
Platform:64GB

Easily enter virtual reality with no PC or wires attached. Oculus Go is a standalone VR headset made to fit you. Designed with breathable fabrics, adjustable straps and our best lenses yet.


Please note: Power adapter not included. 10W (5V 2A) AC adapter required





BOX CONTAINS


Go Device
Controller
Printed Accessory Folio w/quick start Manual
1 AA battery
Lens Cloth
Micro USB cable
feature_bullets: Personal Viewing: The littlest, big screen. Crystal clear optics and state-of-the-art 3D graphics make your headset feel more like a personal theatre
Viewing with Friends: Watch with friends. Meet up in VR with friends and fans from around the world to catch live sports, concerts, or just your favourite TV show
Portable & Easy to use: Ready when you are. Experience portable, all-in-one VR. That means no PC, phone, wires or hassles
Controller: Effortless control. Whether it's navigating to your favourite shows or to a far-off land, the intuitive controller makes getting there easy

Built-In Audio: Surrounded by sound. Spatial audio drivers are built right into the headset, providing dramatic, immersive sound without the need for bulky or tangled headphones. Oculus Go also features a 3.5 mm audio jack, so how you listen is always up to you

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
